data.meta_description:
79 likes, 4 comments - knucklehead_hq on June 5, 2024: "Flashback to a favourite: Maceo Frostâ€™s film for Nokia was shot in the Kibera slum in Kenya and sensitively depicts the children and teacher at the Spurgeons Ballet Centre, where a love of dance brings hope in the most difficult of conditions.

One of our absolute favourite projects to be involved in, itâ€™s an example of Frostâ€™s magic touch as a director - his work is always exquisitely crafted, but also packs an emotional punch that is rarely seen in advertising. 

Huge love and respect for everyone involved in this project, from @maceofrost to DOP @robinasselmeyer Editor @andreasarvidsson Producer @francismw Agency @motherlondon and Creatives @kyleharmanturner and @martinjrose and of course the Spurgeons Ballet Programme who kindly let us have a glimpse into their lives. 

Watch the full film at link in bio. ðŸ’ƒ".
